title: Article 11 - MOHAWK RIVER DRAINAGE BASIN SERIES
content:
Article 11 - MOHAWK RIVER DRAINAGE BASIN SERIES
State Regulations

Part 875 - SAUQUOIT CREEK DRAINAGE BASIN (§ 875.1 to 875.6)

Part 876 - MOHAWK RIVER DRAINAGE BASIN (§ 876.1 to 876.7)

Part 877 - MOHAWK RIVER (BETWEEN THE BOUNDARY LINES OF THE TOWNS OF FLOYD AND MARCY AND THE FLOYD AVENUE BRIDGE IN THE CITY OF ROME AND THE BARGE CANAL WEST OF TRIBUTARY 227 (§ 877.1 to 877.6)

Part 878 - EAST CANADA CREEK DRAINAGE BASIN (§ 878.1 to 878.9)

Part 879 - SCHOHARIE CREEK DRAINAGE BASIN (§ 879.1 to 879.9)

Part 880 - WEST CANADA CREEK DRAINAGE BASIN (§ 880.1 to 880.9)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
